title: Does the sun on "Lockdown " threaten life on earth?
subtitle: This concept was very sticky on the brand during the outbreak of the Corona-19 virus epidemic in the spring of 2020.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: By the spring of 2020, the sun had entered a period of "closure" where its solar activity had declined to such an extent that famine, earthquakes and frozen weather threatened life on Earth.
